As part of the action used to cast this power, you must make a melee weapon attack against one creature within your reach, otherwise the power fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and gains 1 slowed level until the start of your next turn, as the cold energy seeps into its being. Additionally, if the target doesn't move at least 5 feet before the start of your next turn, it immediately takes [[/r 1d8]] cold damage, and the power ends.

This power's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra [[/r 1d8]] cold damage to the target, and the damage the target takes for not moving increases to [[/r 2d8]]. Both damage rolls increase by [[/r 1d8]] at 11th level and 17th level.
